channel.title: Question that came up in a test
channel.description:
Question 3: If one person invites three people to his party and 4 die how many people are left? 8 7 0 45 Only invites 3
The correct answer is `Only invites 3 `, according to the website but, I think it is 0 because of the fact, One person (There is already 1 person at the party) invites 3 people to the party (1 + 3 Guests = 4) and 4 people die, that makes 0.

item.title: Question that came up in a test
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Cain_:

Only invites three is the correct answer, because the “and four die” only applies to the invited

Oh, thanks. I didn’t look at it that way.

Read full topic
